column4: if an installation is interupted, is there a way to pick up where it left off, or is it best to just restart it?

i have a linksys wmp54g (bcm43xx based) wireless network card that I know is getting power (is plugged in properly, ect.) but is not being recognized by a clean install of fiesty, how do I get it to recognize this card, please?
I have a broadcom bcm43xx card and read a nice walkthrough on the dell 1501 blog (google "ubuntu 1501" go back to the oldests posts
hmm sorry I dont know much about the cards
